verses.verse: God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all these words, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage. <S%H5650><s%>
"You shall have no other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before me. <S%H6440><s%>

"You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> for yourselves an idol, <S%H6459><s%> nor any image of anything that <S%H834><s%> is in the heavens <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4605><s%> or that <S%H834><s%> is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, <S%H4325><s%> or that is in the water under the earth: <S%H776><s%>

you shall not bow yourself down <S%H7812><s%> to them, <S%H5647><s%> nor serve them, <S%H3068><s%> for I, Yahweh your God, <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> on the children, <S%H1121><s%> on the third <S%H8029><s%> and on the fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of those who hate me, <S%H8130><s%>
and showing <S%H6213><s%> loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> to thousands <S%H505><s%> of those who love <S%H157><s%> me and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments. <S%H4687><s%>

"You shall not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in vain, <S%H7723><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> who takes <S%H5375><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
"Remember <S%H2142><s%> the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> to keep it holy. <S%H6942><s%>
You shall labor <S%H5647><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all your work, <S%H4399><s%>

but the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> You shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> in it, <S%H1121><s%> you, nor your son, nor your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> your male servant, <S%H5650><s%> nor your female servant, <S%H519><s%> nor your livestock, <S%H929><s%> nor your stranger <S%H1616><s%> who is within your gates; <S%H8179><s%>

for in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth, <S%H776><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and all that is in them, <S%H5117><s%> and rested the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> therefore Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and made it holy. <S%H6942><s%>

"Honor <S%H3513><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> and your mother, <S%H517><s%> that your days <S%H3117><s%> may be long <S%H748><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you. <S%H5414><s%>
"You shall not murder. <S%H7523><s%>
"You shall not commit adultery. <S%H5003><s%>
"You shall not steal. <S%H1589><s%>
"You shall not give <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> testimony <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

"You shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%> You shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> nor his male servant, <S%H5650><s%> nor his female servant, <S%H519><s%> nor his ox, <S%H7794><s%> nor his donkey, <S%H2543><s%> nor anything that is your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s."

All the people <S%H5971><s%> perceived <S%H7200><s%> the thunderings, <S%H6963><s%> the lightnings, <S%H3940><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> smoking. <S%H6226><s%> When the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H5128><s%> they trembled, and stayed <S%H5975><s%> at a distance. <S%H7350><s%>

They said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Speak <S%H1696><s%> with us yourself, <S%H8085><s%> and we will listen; but don't <S%H430><s%> let God speak <S%H1696><s%> with us, <S%H4191><s%> lest we die."

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid, for God <S%H430><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5668><s%> test <S%H5254><s%> you, <S%H3374><s%> and that his fear may be before you, <S%H6440><s%> that you won't <S%H2398><s%> sin."
The people <S%H5971><s%> stayed <S%H5975><s%> at a distance, <S%H7350><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> to the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%> where God was. <S%H430><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "This is what you shall tell <S%H559><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> <S%H7200><s%> 'You yourselves have seen that I have talked <S%H1696><s%> with you from heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
You shall most certainly not make <S%H6213><s%> alongside of me gods <S%H430><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> or gods <S%H430><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for yourselves. <S%H6213><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> of earth <S%H127><s%> for me, <S%H2076><s%> and shall sacrifice on it your burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and your peace offerings, <S%H5930><s%> your sheep <S%H6629><s%> and your cattle. <S%H1241><s%> In every place <S%H4725><s%> where I record <S%H2142><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> I will come <S%H935><s%> to you and I will bless you. <S%H1288><s%>

If you make <S%H6213><s%> me an altar <S%H4196><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> you shall not build <S%H1129><s%> it of cut stones; <S%H68><s%> for if you lift up <S%H5130><s%> your tool <S%H2719><s%> on it, <S%H2490><s%> you have polluted it.
Neither shall you go up <S%H5927><s%> by steps <S%H4609><s%> to my altar, <S%H4196><s%> that your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> may not be exposed to it. <S%H1540><s%>'
